summary: Comprehensive testing of Fotos Express photographer recruitment system completed successfully. All major backend APIs and frontend integration features are working including staff approval, activation, login, and dashboard functionality.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/seed resets data including P01 candidate
Backend API POST /api/staff/approve/P01 generates activation link successfully
Backend API GET /api/staff/validate-token validates activation tokens correctly
Backend API POST /api/staff/activate activates account with token and password
Backend API POST /api/staff/login validates credentials for new account
Backend API POST /api/staff/change-password changes password successfully
Admin panel access with password 'Fotosexpress2026$' working correctly
Candidatos section displays candidate email (javier@cam.pr) on recruitment card
Candidate information displayed correctly: name, email, phone, equipment, experience
APROBAR INGRESO button is present and clickable
Account activation page shows 'ENLACE INVÁLIDO' for used/expired tokens (expected behavior)
Staff login successful with email javier@cam.pr and password
Staff dashboard loads correctly showing user information
Mi Perfil section accessible and displays user data correctly
Password change form in Mi Perfil works with success message 'CONTRASEÑA ACTUALIZADA CORRECTAMENTE'
Professional UI design with proper navigation and user experience
